data.actual_result: The animation begins for a couple frames
data.expected_result: The animation doesn't move at all until it begins
data.short_description: The Nearby Wumpus searching animation begins when Bluetooth and Wifi is off for a couple frames, then flicks back to the first frame
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Bluetooth, and Wifi is off - Open your friends list - Tap the Add Friend button (top right) - Tap Find Friends - Watch the image (focus on the bottom of the wumpus hands if you can't tell)
